CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.3.1c, testname (100AN)
E2B (R3): F.r.2.1 Test Name (free text) User Guidance: This data element captures a free text description of the test when an appropriate MedDRA code is unavailable. Conformance: Optional, but required if F.r.1 is populated and F.r.2.2b is not populated. Data Type: 250AN OID: None Value: Allowed Free text
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element captures a free text description of the test when an appropriate MedDRA code is unavailable.
CustomField.label: Test Name
